message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its features and value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, however, the product's value is quite high.  I can come down to $13,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the flexibility, I still believe we could reach an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000.
